atlas.controller

Class LanguageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlas.controller.BasicController
      • atlas.controller.LanguageController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @SessionScoped
 @Named(value="languageController")
public class LanguageController
extends BasicController
implements Serializable
    Manages internationalization (locales and site languages). SessionScoped managed bean, controller for language_bar.xhtml component. Locale, language and list of available languages are initialized post-construct. Language matches browser preference or resorts to default.
    Author:
    Michal Smrha
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
